title: The Third Man
description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: All the King's Men
description: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

title: White Heat
description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring escape from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: The Heiress
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A young, naive woman falls for a handsome young man who her emotionally abusive father suspects is a fortune hunter.

title: A Letter to Three Wives
description: A letter from a local seductress is delivered to three wives on a boat trip, stating she has run off with one of their husbands, but not saying which one.

title: On the Town
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Three sailors on a day of shore leave in New York City look for fun and romance before their twenty-four hours are up.

title: Adam's Rib
description: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
description: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
description: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

title: Twelve O'Clock High
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A hard-as-nails general takes over a B-17 bomber unit suffering from low morale and whips them into fighting shape.

title: Battleground
description: A squad of the 101st Airborne Division copes with the siege of Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge.

title: The Set-Up
description: An aging boxer refuses to take a dive in a fixed match, leading to a deadly confrontation with the mob.

title: Sands of Iwo Jima
description: A tough Marine sergeant commands a squad of recruits during the Battle of Iwo Jima.

title: I Was a Male War Bride
description: A French Captain marries an American Lieutenant and must find a way to accompany her back to the US under the War Bride Act.

title: The Fountainhead
description: An uncompromising architect struggles to maintain his integrity and creative freedom in the face of public rejection and corporate pressure.

title: Late Spring
description: Noriko is twenty-seven years old and still living with her widowed father. Everybody tries to talk her into marrying, but she wants to stay and care for her father.

title: Stray Dog
description: A rookie detective has his gun stolen and frantically searches the Tokyo underworld to find it before it is used in a crime.

title: Bitter Rice
description: A petty criminal and his girlfriend hide out in the rice fields of the Po Valley, involving a rice worker in their schemes.

title: Whisky Galore!
description: Scottish islanders try to plunder 50,000 cases of whisky from a stranded ship.

title: Caught
description: A young woman marries a wealthy man, but soon finds herself trapped in a loveless and controlling marriage.

title: The Reckless Moment
description: A suburban housewife tries to cover up a murder to protect her daughter, but she is blackmailed by a seedy criminal.

title: Criss Cross
description: An armored truck driver gets lured into a heist by his ex-wife and her gangster husband.

title: Champion
description: An unscrupulous boxer fights his way to the top, stepping on everyone who helps him along the way.

title: Little Women
description: The four March sisters grow up in New England during and after the Civil War.

title: The Inspector General
description: An illiterate showman is mistaken for the Inspector General in a corrupt town and takes advantage of the situation.

title: Samson and Delilah
description: The biblical story of the Danite strongman Samson and the Philistine seductress Delilah.

title: Pinky
description: A black woman who passes for white in the North visits her grandmother in the South and faces the harsh realities of racism.

title: Intruder in the Dust
description: A black man is accused of murdering a white man, and a young boy and an old woman attempt to prove his innocence before a lynch mob arrives.

title: The Window
description: A young boy with a reputation for telling tall tales witnesses a murder, but his parents refuse to believe him.

title: Mighty Joe Young
description: A young woman raises a giant gorilla in Africa, and they are brought to Hollywood to perform in a nightclub.

title: Thieves' Highway
description: A war veteran seeks revenge on the corrupt produce dealer who crippled his father.

title: Passport to Pimlico
description: Residents of a part of London declare independence when they discover an old treaty.

title: The Rocking Horse Winner
description: A boy learns he can predict horse race winners by madly riding his rocking horse, hoping to solve his family's financial problems.

title: Under Capricorn
description: An Irishman travels to Australia to start a new life and meets a wealthy landowner and his disturbed wife.

title: Whirlpool
description: A kleptomaniac wife of a psychiatrist falls under the spell of a hypnotist and is framed for murder.

title: House of Strangers
description: An Italian banker dominates his four sons, but when the law catches up to him, only one son stands by him.

title: The Big Steal
description: An army lieutenant chases a thief across Mexico to recover stolen payroll, encountering a mysterious woman along the way.

title: Too Late for Tears
description: A ruthless housewife finds a bag of money thrown into her car by mistake and will stop at nothing to keep it.

title: Reign of Terror
description: During the French Revolution, Robespierre's secret police hunt for a black book containing the names of his enemies.

title: Border Incident
description: Mexican and American federal agents team up to stop a smuggling ring that exploits illegal Mexican farm workers.

title: Flamingo Road
description: A carnival dancer stands up to a corrupt political boss in a small town.

title: Madame Bovary
description: The bored wife of a country doctor engages in extramarital affairs to escape the emptiness of her life.

title: The Secret Garden
description: An orphaned girl is sent to live with her reclusive uncle in his forbidding estate and discovers a hidden garden.

title: In the Good Old Summertime
description: Two music store employees who despise each other in person don't realize they are romantic pen pals.

title: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
description: Two baseball players who are also vaudeville performers have trouble with the new female owner of their team.

title: The Barkleys of Broadway
description: A musical comedy team breaks up when the female member wants to pursue a serious acting career.

title: Holiday Affair
description: A war widow is torn between a boring attorney and a romantic drifter during the Christmas season.

title: Come to the Stable
description: Two French nuns come to a small New England town to build a children's hospital.

title: The Hasty Heart
description: Wounded soldiers in a Burmese hospital try to befriend a Scottish soldier who doesn't know he is dying.

title: Knock on Any Door
description: A lawyer defends a young hoodlum accused of murder, arguing that his environment is to blame.
